docs.snippet: The enthusiasm of the day seemed to culminate at the mass meeting, held in Cooper Institute, in the evening, under the auspices of the Union Defence Committee.

headline.main: MASS MEETING AT THE COOPER INSTITUE.; RECEPTION OF LIEUT.-GEN. SCOTT Speeches of Judge Pierrepont. Wm. M. Evarts, Esq., Hon. Henry J. Raymond, Ex-Gov. Hunt, and Joseph Hoxie, Esq. docs.snippet: It becomes our painful duty to chronicle the death of Dr. LUTHER V. BELL. Medical Director to Gen. HOOKER'S Division, who expired last evening, after a short but painful illness.

headline.main: Death of the Medical Director of Gen. Hooker's Division.; QUARTERS ELEVENTH REGIMENT MASS. VOLUNTEERS,

docs.snippet: I pretermitted my opportunity to forward to you a communication by the last mail, for which omission I have to express my regret.
